section.name: JXME Bluetooth Properties
section.p: The JXME-BT component can be configured by the following properties. When running on J2ME it has the made sure by the application developer that the Application properties are copied into the OSGi container.

tr.td: determines whether this peer is a "normal peer" or a rendez-vous peer
Specify the time between two device discovery phases in ms.

section.p: Note: When using JXME-BT on J2ME the ch.ethz.jadabs.jxme.peeralias has to be set accordingly. This is not necessary on J2SE since in this case JXME is able set the JXME name equal to the name of the local host. However this is not possible on J2ME therefore the host name has to be set explicitly.
